thread.title: BRIEF-Platinum Eagle Acquisition To Separate Trading Of Its Class A Ordinary Shares & Warrants

title: BRIEF-Platinum Eagle Acquisition To Separate Trading Of Its Class A Ordinary Shares & Warrants
text: March 5, 2018 / 8:43 PM / Updated 16 minutes ago BRIEF-Platinum Eagle Acquisition To Separate Trading Of Its Class A Ordinary Shares & Warrants Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 5 (Reuters) - Platinum Eagle Acquisition Corp : * PLATINUM EAGLE ACQUISITION CORP. ANNOUNCES THE SEPARATE TRADING OF ITS CLASS A ORDINARY SHARES AND WARRANTS * PLATINUM EAGLE ACQUISITION - HOLDERS OF UNITS SOLD IN COâ€™S IPO MAY ELECT TO SEPARATELY TRADE CLASS A ORDINARY SHARES & WARRANTS COMMENCING ON MARCH 5 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
